introduction: This DVD showcases Sade's live performance at San Diego's Open Air Theatre on October 3, 1993. It features 17 tracks such as "Jezebel," "Like a Tattoo," "Kiss of Life," "Love is Stronger Than Pride" and more!With her adult-oriented blend of smooth jazz and pop music, Sade has become one of the reigning stars of the VH1 set. This hour and a half long video features the soulful diva performing sixteen of her soothing tunes, including "The Sweetest Taboo," "Cherry Pie," and the chart topping hit "Smooth Operator." The concert was filmed live in San Diego.
